means: 晒太阳，取暖( bask的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We sat basking in the warm sunshine.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们坐着享受温暖的阳光。

sentence.Network_en: A colony of seals lay basking in the sun.
He has spent a month basking in the adulation of the fans back in Jamaica.
sentence.Network_cn: 他整整一个月都沉浸在牙买加影迷们的追捧中。

PerfectNetExp.abs: THE economy of the euro area is basking in a rare period of optimism ., 欧元区经济弥漫着少见的乐观气氛.
She spent a month in the capital , basking in civilization ' s comfort ., 她在首都呆了一个月 , 尽情享受文明带来的舒适.

五. 雾姥甲虫（Fog-basking） 这种外表普通无奇的甲虫却会用一种非常与众不同的方法收集水分。纳米布沙漠的降水非常稀少，因此 …
尺寸上排第二位的是姥鲨（basking shark），平均长为大约25英尺（7.6米）。它们生活在温带海洋中。

GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... bashful adj. 害羞的,羞怯的 bask v. 晒太阳,取暖 bassoon n. 低音管,巴松.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... bashful adj. 害羞的,羞怯的 bask v. 晒太阳,取暖 bassoon n. 低音管,巴松.

entry.def: If you bask in the sunshine, you lie somewhere sunny and enjoy the heat.

example.ex: All through the hot, still days of their holiday Amy basked in the sun...
example.tran: 在整个炎热、安静的假日，埃米一直在晒太阳。

example.ex: Crocodiles bask on the small sandy beaches.
example.tran: 鳄鱼在小沙滩上晒太阳。

entry.tran: 沉浸于，尽情享受（赞美、宠爱或崇拜）
entry.def: If you bask in someone's  approval, favour, or admiration, you greatly enjoy their positive reaction towards you.

example.ex: He has spent a month basking in the adulation of the fans back in Jamaica...
example.tran: 他整整一个月都沉浸在牙买加影迷们的追捧中。

example.ex: Livy smiled and basked in Rachel's approval.
example.tran: 莉薇微笑着，雷切尔的赞许令她如沐春风。
